page.title: 08Language and Trade
page.content:
The differences between the west bank and the east bank of the{river Loughor are not only physical ones. The rate of anglicising seems greater on the {West Glamorgan}side than on the{Dyfed side. There are more Welsh speakers in the more rural{Dyfed}area than in the more industrial{West Glamorgan}side.
{Pontarddulais}families do their shopping mainly in Swansea, whilst {Llangennech}and{Hendy}families use Llanelli as their main shopping centre.{Pontarddulais}is the larger of the three communities and contains the greater range of facilities for its families. These are found centrally in the main street passing through the village.
